name: @oas-tools/oas-telemetry
description: This package exports an Express middleware that traces requests and responses of an Express application using OpenTelemetry.
author: Manuel Otero

scripts.devUi: nodemon --watch dev/ui src --ext html --exec "npm run devExportUi && npm run build && node test/functional/otTestServer.cjs"
scripts.devUiEsm: nodemon --watch dev/ui --ext html --exec "npm run devExportUi && node test/functional/otTestServer.mjs"
scripts.test: npm run testCJS && npm run testMJS
scripts.build:dockerTest: npm run build && docker build -t oastlm-test-ks-api -f ./test/performance/ks-api/Dockerfile .
scripts.testCJS: npm run preTestCJS && npm run launchTestCJS && npm run postTestCJS
scripts.launchTestCJS: npx -y wait-on http://localhost:3000/api/v1/pets && npm run sendRequests && sleep 4 && npm run checkRequestsLog
scripts.postTestCJS: kill `ps -uax | grep "node test/functional/otTestServer" | grep -v "grep" | grep -v "sh" | awk '{print $2}'`
scripts.testMJS: npm run preTestMJS && npm run launchTestMJS && npm run postTestMJS
scripts.launchTestMJS: npx -y wait-on http://localhost:3000/api/v1/pets && npm run sendRequests && sleep 4 && npm run checkRequestsLog
scripts.postTestMJS: kill `ps -uax | grep "node test/functional/otTestServer" | grep -v "grep" | grep -v "sh" | awk '{print $2}'`
scripts.launchKSApi: npm run build; (cd test/performance/ks-api ; node indexTelemetry.js)
